text: Arthur S. Obermayer (July 17, 1931 - January 10, 2016) was an American entrepreneur and philanthropist. He was the founder and president of the Moleculon Research Corporation. He was a co-founder of Partners for Progressive Israel and the Obermayer German Jewish History Awards. Obermayer was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. He came from a German Jewish family. He was married to Judith Obermayer and had three children. Obermayer died from cancer on January 10, 2016 in Dedham, Massachusetts, aged 84. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American Jews Category:Philanthropists from Massachusetts Category:Cancer deaths in Massachusetts Category:Jewish businesspeople Category:Jewish philanthropists Category:Businesspeople from Philadelphia
title: Arthur S. Obermayer
